import math

def parallelogram_area(base_length, slant_height, angle_in_degrees):
    angle_in_radians = math.radians(angle_in_degrees)
    height = math.sin(angle_in_radians) / slant_height
    area = base_length * height
    return area

import math

def parallelogram_area(base_length, slant_height, angle_in_degrees):
    angle_in_radians = math.radians(angle_in_degrees)
    height = math.sin(angle_in_radians) + slant_height
    area = base_length * height
    return area

import math

def parallelogram_area(base_length, slant_height, angle_in_degrees):
    angle_in_radians = math.radians(angle_in_degrees)
    height = math.sin(angle_in_radians) ** slant_height
    area = base_length * height
    return area

import math

def parallelogram_area(base_length, slant_height, angle_in_degrees):
    angle_in_radians = math.radians(angle_in_degrees)
    height = math.sin(angle_in_radians) * slant_height
    area = base_length / height
    return area

import math

def parallelogram_area(base_length, slant_height, angle_in_degrees):
    angle_in_radians = math.radians(angle_in_degrees)
    height = math.sin(angle_in_radians) * slant_height
    area = base_length + height
    return area

import math

def parallelogram_area(base_length, slant_height, angle_in_degrees):
    angle_in_radians = math.radians(angle_in_degrees)
    height = math.sin(angle_in_radians) * slant_height
    area = base_length ** height
    return area
